snippet: Dallas's Dirk Nowitzki seems certain to be omitted from the N.B.A. All-Star roster after a 10-year run.
abstract: Dallas's Dirk Nowitzki seems certain to be omitted from the N.B.A. All-Star roster after a 10-year run.
lead_paragraph: The selections for the N.B.A.'s annual All-Star Game are always a hot topic in the basketball world, and for good reason. Although the selections function only as an invitation to a largely irrelevant exhibition event, the message broadcast through the most official of league channels is simple and powerful: These are the 24 best players in the league, and they are being brought together to compete in a single star-studded game for the benefit of fans everywhere.

headline.main: Nowitzki's Slow Start Should Cost Him All-Star Berth
